data.name: Botlike - a robot's rampage - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Botlike - A Robot's Rampage - Soundtrack

The original soundtrack to Botlike – A Robot's Rampage, featuring music for all the different areas and stages in the game as well as signature tracks for the various bosses you'll be fighting. For the time of Early Access on Steam, we will be writing and recording more and more music as additional levels and enemies get added to the game.

Buyers of the Deluxe and Supporter Edition will receive the soundtrack once the game leaves Early Access as we will change things around and remaster all of the tracks for a proper album release.

List of tracks in the game so far:

1. Botlike - A Robot's Rampage (Main Theme)
2. S.I.R. Reactivated (Forest Theme)
3. Scavenging the Depths Below (Caves Theme)
4. Rust Town (Base Theme)
5. The Ancient Graveyard
6. The Guardian Awakens (First Boss Theme)

Expect this list to expand and titles to change as more content and lore is added to Botlike during our time in Early Access.

Composed and produced by Breakdown Epiphanies (Patrick Delaney and Dennis Meyer).
